Title: Authorizes the New York state energy research and development authority to enter into agreements to establish a New York renewable energy laboratory
Summary: Authorizes the New York state energy research and development authority to enter into agreements to establish a New York renewable energy laboratory to develop renewable energy and energy efficiency technologies and practices, advance related science and engineering, create jobs, promote economic development and manufacturing, and transfer knowledge and innovations to address the state's energy and environmental goals.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize the New York state energy research and development authority to enter into agreements to establish a New York renewable energy laboratory
